divs: sighting details el cajon, san diego ~ backyard ~ about 9 p.m. ~ waiting for fireworks i first noticed one bright red light coming from the north heading southeast, thinking i was getting to see a satellite\space station\weather ballon. what startled me was watching 2-3 other red lights approach from the south and form an open triangle and hover. the 3 lights then seemed to follow the larger, bright red light towards the east, moving very slowly, and then disappearing from my sight. i still think these possibly might be experimental helicopter\hovercraft, that can fly at slow speeds. nightime skies make it difficult to estimate depth\size of objects. would be a nice annual gimmick to pull off if possible! seems like it is.
Summary: Multiple red lights moving slowly in the eastern sky.
trends: There have been 41 other sightings in El Cajon
There were 5 other sightings in El Cajon on or around July 4th 2009
